body:
Ravish Brothers - Created by RileGuy and Lavish

Intro:

Greetings from Cal and Riley, we are excited to announce the Ravish Bros are extending into a full on build team instead of just the two of us. After making two maps together, we decided it would be the right thing to do as we would like to work with more talented builders. The team will be building maps of any gamemode together but while this is happening, Riley and I will still be building our own maps occasionally off to the side, while still helping with team builds. If you would like to join, the application template is down below, the deadline for submitting applications is 5/2/15. Responses will be sent out by 5/4/15. The email to apply is, ravishbros@gmail.com. We are accepting 12 members to start off with. There is a possibility applications will open up again after they close depending on following events.


Ravish Bros Application Template -

Your IGN:

Time Zone:

Age:

Why you would like to join:

How you would benefit team:

Specific Building Qualities:

Experience?:

Screenshots of some of your Builds:

Extra Information that might help you:

Skype:

Email:


About the Ravish Bros:

The name originates from our two ign’s; RileGuy and Lavish. The Ravish Bros was first created after Riley and I built our first map together with the help of others,

Folkvangr (Nebula DTM):

https://avicus.net/forums/ac368b87f

After building that map, we decided we work great together and created the Ravish Bros. The second map we have created is called

Arcadia (Nebula CTW):

https://avicus.net/forums/6a8f1c7a9?page=1

A 4 way CTW map.


We are ambitious and creative in our ideas, but hope to incorporate others ideas into future maps hence the build team being created.


Remember that even if you're not good at building you can still apply! We are looking for all experience levels and hopefully we can build and grow as a team together.


Regards,

Cal and Riley
body_tagged:
Ravish Brothers - Created by RileGuy and Lavish

Intro:

Greetings from Cal and Riley, we are excited to announce the Ravish Bros are extending into a full on build team instead of just the two of us. After making two maps together, we decided it would be the right thing to do as we would like to work with more talented builders. The team will be building maps of any gamemode together but while this is happening, Riley and I will still be building our own maps occasionally off to the side, while still helping with team builds. If you would like to join, the application template is down below, the deadline for submitting applications is 5/2/15. Responses will be sent out by 5/4/15. The email to apply is, ravishbros@gmail.com. We are accepting 12 members to start off with. There is a possibility applications will open up again after they close depending on following events.


Ravish Bros Application Template -

How you would benefit team:

Experience?:

About the Ravish Bros:

The name originates from our two ign’s; RileGuy and Lavish. The Ravish Bros was first created after Riley and I built our first map together with the help of others,

Folkvangr (Nebula DTM):

https://avicus.net/forums/ac368b87f

After building that map, we decided we work great together and created the Ravish Bros. The second map we have created is called

Arcadia (Nebula CTW):

https://avicus.net/forums/6a8f1c7a9?page=1

A 4 way CTW map.


We are ambitious and creative in our ideas, but hope to incorporate others ideas into future maps hence the build team being created.


Remember that even if you're not good at building you can still apply! We are looking for all experience levels and hopefully we can build and grow as a team together.


Regards,

Cal and Riley
title: RAVISH BROS BUILD TEAM *Applications Closed*

replies.body: ^ If you guys have questions, feel free to ask! Let's make this the best build team in existence!
replies.body_tagged: ^ If you guys have questions, feel free to ask! Let's make this the best build team in existence!

replies.body: If you apply you get a cookie :]
replies.body_tagged: If you apply you get a cookie :]

replies.body:
Hey Lavish/Rile!!

I'm very interested in applying, and Iv'e been looking for a team to join that enjoys building! So here's my application!

Your IGN: AeroScape

Time Zone: PST (Pacific Time zone)

Age: 15

Why you would like to join: I would like to have some friends that share the same building interests as me, who also accept my ideas about map building and related topics.

How you would benefit team: I am very detailed in designing things. Especially buildings, landscapes, monument designs.. etc. I have very good artistic abilities, and I think my style of building will make our builds look very pleasing to viewers/players.

Specific Building Qualities: I'm really good at building like modern styles of buildings. I can also create very good designs of things such as World War 2 battle sites. However, I'm not that great with hills, and elevated ground sort of designs... I'm also good at creating stadiums.. yes. Like sports arena's and sporting facilities! Overall I'm an architecture fanatic!

Experience?: I don't have any real world edit experience... But I would love to learn! Besides not having world edit, iv'e managed to create unique designs despite a larger time frame..

Screenshots of some of your Builds: As I said, i don't have any current builds atm, but if you would like, just ask me what you want me to build.. I'll make anything, I have a passion for building things. if you want, i can try to slip some time in to build you guys something!

Extra Information that might help you: If i am accepted, I would love some world edit training, I just need the basics.. Question: If I build something for you guys, does it have to be map related?? Or could it just be anything that iv'e built?

Skype: christian.hartley14

Email: 123christianhartley@gmail.com


 I would love to be part of this build team! If i'm not accepted, Thanks for the offer! 



From, Aero

replies.body:
Your IGN: Your IGN: LeCobalt

Time Zone: UTC-7:00

Age:14

Why you would like to join: I wanna be in a team once again and I think I'll give this new team a shot.

How you would benefit team: I dislike building inside of minecraft, I build everyone in a while INSIDE of minecraft, but I don't like what I get with the time I place into them. Now, just that I dislike placing blocks in MC doesn't mean I can't build cool stuff. I'm what I like to call an schematic manager. I know the commands, the code, the programs and can build a town in 5 minutes if you ask me too. I work inside of MC Edit with placement schematic and on WP with bo2's that could theorically let me build an infinite map. I do know how to build inside of MC. I'm not any cube guy with pretty colors. I'm known for my realistic, nordic style.

Specific Building Qualities: Nordic, Realistic, Schematic and Bo2 management, Terraforming, Large-Scale Terraforming.

Experience?: oh boy, I've been on around 3 solid teams (discarting the 2 day ones) out of 2 which two of them, I was leader.

Screenshots of some of your Builds: https://avicus.net/forums/fe3c9a845


(google cobalt838, some of the builds that appear should be mine, although ask me before you think they are)

Extra Information that might help you: I'm Cobby:P 

Skype: c0balt838

Email: cobaltdoesmc@gmail.com

replies.body: Update 4/24/15: We've just accepted two builders into the build team. For those who haven't gotten a response yet, this does not mean you have been denied, you are still being reviewed. But we are only accepting 10 more builders. Congratulations to FlufflesSub and Rapturous for being accepted. (: Cheers!
replies.body_tagged: Update 4/24/15: We've just accepted two builders into the build team. For those who haven't gotten a response yet, this does not mean you have been denied, you are still being reviewed. But we are only accepting 10 more builders. Congratulations to FlufflesSub and Rapturous for being accepted. (: Cheers!

replies.body: Update 4/25/15: We've just accepted three builders into the build team. For those who haven't gotten a response yet, this does not mean you have been denied, you are still being reviewed. But we are only accepting 7 more builders. Congratulations to NinjaBridge, Zintenka and LeCobalt for being accepted. (: Cheers!

REALLY IMPORTANT UPDATE: THE NEW DEADLINE FOR APPLYING IS 5/2/15, ONE MORE WEEK!
